trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a promotion fails.

This exception should be thrown by an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> interface to indicate that a call to <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> has failed.

If an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> fails a promotion due to an exception that is not fatal, it should catch that exception and create a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException> with the original exception as the inner exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified message.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
For more information, see the <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref> property.
